lines.text: What kind of champagne do you have?
I want you to know I will wait for you unti you turn 21 or get out of jail, which ever comes first.
That is the most romantic thing anyone has ever said to me.
He doesn't believe in hitting a woman.

[to Judy]
Listen, every time I hear you say you hate me, I'll know that means you love me.

[voice over]
It was the goofiest thing I'd ever said.
That's the goofiest thing I've ever heard.
